description:

>   --nic net-id=06dcf378-27b8-4cd8-bebd-190f3c9fe964 --security-group default \
>   --key-name mykey selfservice-instance


Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<class 'oslo_config.cfg.NoSuchOptError'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-5045f1cd-1894-4364-916a-b803ba5729b8
title: Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.

comments.content: This looks like you have an error in your api-paste.ini file. Check your settings. If you need further assistance, feel free to send a question to the openstack mailing list or on the #openstack irc channel.
